page.title: 02SUMMARY OF AREA (PART ONE)
page.content: Our area of 12 squares is a rural area.Its main land usage is for farming.The farming is mixed,with crops,grassland,dairy cattle,beef cattle and arable usage.The main residential areas are Hutton Henry, Station Town and a small part of Wingate.The only education centre is at the Hutton Henry Church of England (Controlled) Junior Mixed and Infant School.The major road is a dual carriage-way called the A19,it clips the north eastern part of the area.It is a very busy route.The other minor roads are the roads going through Station Town and Hutton Henry,ending up at a junction on the A19,the other route is by passing Carstead Wood,down past Blakeley Hill then through South Wingate and ending up on the A19 as well.
